name: Singapore Exchange Limited
goal: Singapore Exchange Limited is an international exchange group based in Singapore. It carries out various financial activities, including operating securities and derivatives exchanges and clearing houses, an OTC bond trading platform, a central securities depository, a wholesale electricity market and benchmark providers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, International co-operation and development
euInitiatives: EMIR, CSDR, MiFID II, Benchmarks Regulation, FTT, CMU, GDPR, CRR, CCP recovery and resolution, UK withdrawal from the EU
